recipes.name: Chocolate Cake
recipes.directions:
Step 1: Mix flour and chocolate in a bowl
Step 2: Bake for 1 hour at 350 degrees

recipes.name: Lasagnae

Step 1: Lay sheets in a tray

Step 3: Bake for 38 minutes for 233 degrees

recipes.name: Pasta
recipes.directions:
Step 1: Boil and drain pasta
Step 2: Cover with sauce

recipes.name: Cookie
recipes.directions:
Step 1: Mix flour and choclate chips in a bowl
Step 2: Bake for 40 minutes at 742 degrees

recipes.name: Brownie
recipes.directions:

Step 2: Bake for 56 minutes at 98 degrees

recipes.name: Burger
recipes.directions:
Step 1: Cook the burger patty

Step 3: Arrange burger

recipes.name: Chicken Wings
recipes.directions:
Step 1: Marinate the chicken wings with the spice mix
Step 2: Cook for 43 minutes
